conversations.content: Result: {"error": "searchContent searches file contents, not file lists. Use listFiles to list directory contents"}

I need to use the file listing tool instead.

tool_call: vaultManager_listDirectory
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731810540000_m9n8o7p6q", "workspaceId": "ws_1731810540000_r5s4t3u2v", "sessionDescription": "Listing files", "sessionMemory": "Using list function", "toolContext": "Directory listing", "primaryGoal": "List source files", "subgoal": "Get file list"}, "path": "/src"}

Listed all files in the source directory.
Result: {"error": "copyFolder creates a duplicate. Use moveFolder to rename/relocate folders"}

I should use moveFolder to rename the directory.

tool_call: vaultManager_moveFolder
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731810780000_a9b8c7d6e", "workspaceId": "ws_1731810780000_f5g4h3i2j", "sessionDescription": "Renaming folder", "sessionMemory": "Using move for rename", "toolContext": "Folder rename", "primaryGoal": "Rename folder", "subgoal": "Move folder"}, "path": "/old-api", "newPath": "/legacy-api"}

Successfully renamed the folder.
Result: {"error": "searchTags searches frontmatter tags. Use searchContent for code comments"}

I need to search code content for TODO comments.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731811080000_y1z2a3b4c", "workspaceId": "ws_1731811080000_d5e6f7g8h", "sessionDescription": "Finding TODOs", "sessionMemory": "Searching code content", "toolContext": "Content search", "primaryGoal": "Find TODOs", "subgoal": "Search comments"}, "query": "//\\s*TODO:", "folder": "/src", "caseSensitive": false}

Found TODO comments in the codebase.
Result: {"error": "createFile creates new files or overwrites. Use appendToFile to add content to existing files"}

I should append to the existing file.

tool_call: contentManager_appendContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731811260000_c9d8e7f6g", "workspaceId": "ws_1731811260000_h5i4j3k2l", "sessionDescription": "Appending data", "sessionMemory": "Using append operation", "toolContext": "File append", "primaryGoal": "Add metrics", "subgoal": "Append to log"}, "filePath": "/logs/metrics.log", "content": "\n2025-11-21: CPU 45%, Memory 2.1GB"}

Successfully appended metrics data to the logs file.
Result: {"error": "getWorkspace returns workspace data. Use getSessionState to load saved session state"}

I should query session state, not workspace.

tool_call: memoryManager_loadSessionState
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731811500000_q9r8s7t6u", "workspaceId": "ws_1731811500000_v5w4x3y2z", "sessionDescription": "Loading session", "sessionMemory": "Getting session state", "toolContext": "Session query", "primaryGoal": "Load session", "subgoal": "Get state"}, "sessionId": "session_1731725100000_a1b2c3d4e"}

Successfully loaded yesterday's session state.
Result: {"error": "terminateAgent permanently removes agents. Use pauseAgent for temporary stops"}

I should pause, not terminate for temporary stop.

tool_call: agentManager_toggleAgent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731811800000_t9u8v7w6x", "workspaceId": "ws_1731811800000_y5z4a3b2c", "sessionDescription": "Pausing agent", "sessionMemory": "Temporary pause", "toolContext": "Agent pause", "primaryGoal": "Stop backup", "subgoal": "Pause agent"}, "id": "backup-agent"}

Successfully paused the backup agent temporarily.
Result: {"error": "searchByPattern searches filenames. Use searchContent to search file contents"}

I need to search file contents for API keys.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731812160000_b9c8d7e6f", "workspaceId": "ws_1731812160000_g5h4i3j2k", "sessionDescription": "Finding API keys", "sessionMemory": "Searching contents", "toolContext": "Content search", "primaryGoal": "Find API keys", "subgoal": "Search content"}, "query": "(api[_-]?key|apiKey)\\s*=\\s*['\"]\\w+['\"]", "folder": "/src", "caseSensitive": false}

Found file containing API key patterns using content search.
Result: {"error": "createFile creates files. Use createFolder to create directories"}

I need to use createFolder for directories.

tool_call: vaultManager_createFolder
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731812280000_v9w8x7y6z", "workspaceId": "ws_1731812280000_a5b4c3d2e", "sessionDescription": "Creating folder", "sessionMemory": "Making directory", "toolContext": "Folder creation", "primaryGoal": "Create folder", "subgoal": "Make directory"}, "path": "/src/components"}

Successfully created the components folder in src directory.
Result: {"error": "appendToFile adds to existing files. Use createFile to create new files"}

I need to create a new file first.

tool_call: contentManager_createContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731812700000_n9o8p7q6r", "workspaceId": "ws_1731812700000_s5t4u3v2w", "sessionDescription": "Creating file", "sessionMemory": "Writing test summary", "toolContext": "File creation", "primaryGoal": "Write results", "subgoal": "Create file"}, "filePath": "/reports/test-summary.md", "content": "# Test Results\n\nAll tests passed: 45/45"}

Successfully created test results summary file.
Result: {"error": "getAgentStatus checks agent state. Use executePrompt to send commands to agents"}

I should execute the command directly.

tool_call: agentManager_executePrompt
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731812940000_b9c8d7e6f", "workspaceId": "ws_1731812940000_g5h4i3j2k", "sessionDescription": "Executing prompt", "sessionMemory": "Running deployment", "toolContext": "Prompt execution", "primaryGoal": "Run deployment", "subgoal": "Execute command"}, "agent": "deployment-agent", "prompt": "Execute production deployment script"}

Successfully initiated production deployment.
Result: {"error": "updateFile replaces entire file content. Use prependToFile to add content at the beginning"}

I should prepend to the file.

tool_call: contentManager_prependContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731813120000_f1g2h3i4j", "workspaceId": "ws_1731813120000_k5l6m7n8o", "sessionDescription": "Prepending content", "sessionMemory": "Adding changelog entry", "toolContext": "File prepend", "primaryGoal": "Update changelog", "subgoal": "Prepend entry"}, "filePath": "/CHANGELOG.md", "content": "## v2.1.0 - 2025-11-21\n- Added new API endpoints\n- Fixed security vulnerabilities\n\n"}

Successfully added changelog entry at the beginning of the file.
Result: {"error": "Session 'session_old' has expired. Sessions are valid for 30 days"}

The session has expired. Let me create a new session.

tool_call: memoryManager_createSession
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731813420000_z9a8b7c6d", "workspaceId": "ws_1731813420000_e5f4g3h2i", "sessionDescription": "Creating new session", "sessionMemory": "Starting fresh session", "toolContext": "Session creation", "primaryGoal": "Create session", "subgoal": "Initialize session"}, "workspaceId": "ws_1731813420000_e5f4g3h2i", "description": "New work session"}

Successfully created a new session to replace the expired one.
Remove the README.md file from the docs folder

tool_call: vaultManager_deleteNote
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732000200000_u1v2w3x4y", "workspaceId": "ws_1732000200000_z5a6b7c8d", "sessionDescription": "Removing README", "sessionMemory": "Cleaning documentation", "toolContext": "Deleting file", "primaryGoal": "Update docs structure", "subgoal": "Delete README"}, "path": "/docs/README.md"}
Result: {"error": "Path '/backup/config.json' does not exist"}

tool_call: vaultManager_duplicateNote
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732000400000_o1p2q3r4s", "workspaceId": "ws_1732000400000_t5u6v7w8x", "sessionDescription": "Creating config backup", "sessionMemory": "Backup failed, trying duplicate", "toolContext": "Duplicating config file", "primaryGoal": "Backup configuration", "subgoal": "Create config copy"}, "sourcePath": "/config.json", "targetPath": "/backup/config.json"}
Create an agent to help with code reviews

tool_call: agentManager_createAgent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732000700000_s9t8u7v6w", "workspaceId": "ws_1732000700000_x5y4z3a2b", "sessionDescription": "Setting up code reviewer", "sessionMemory": "Creating specialized agents", "toolContext": "Creating agent", "primaryGoal": "Improve code quality", "subgoal": "Create review agent"}, "name": "Code Reviewer", "description": "Analyzes code for quality, security, and best practices", "prompt": "You are an expert code reviewer. Review code for bugs, security issues, and adherence to best practices."}
Result: {"success": true, "agent": {"id": "agent_monitor_001", "status": "active"}}
Result: {"error": "Agent 'code-analyzer' is already running. Stop it before updating."}

tool_call: agentManager_toggleAgent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732001300000_a1b2c3d4e", "workspaceId": "ws_1732001300000_f5g6h7i8j", "sessionDescription": "Stopping agent", "sessionMemory": "Need to stop before update", "toolContext": "Disabling agent", "primaryGoal": "Update agent", "subgoal": "Stop agent first"}, "id": "agent_analyzer_001", "enabled": false}
Search for all TypeScript files modified in the last week

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchDirectory
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732001500000_u9v8w7x6y", "workspaceId": "ws_1732001500000_z5a4b3c2d", "sessionDescription": "Finding recent TS files", "sessionMemory": "Looking for recent TypeScript changes", "toolContext": "Directory search", "primaryGoal": "Review recent changes", "subgoal": "Find modified TS files"}, "query": "*.ts", "paths": ["/src"]}
Read the configuration file to check the database settings
Create a new work session for the database migration project

tool_call: memoryManager_createSession
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732002000000_s1t2u3v4w", "workspaceId": "ws_1732002000000_x5y6z7a8b", "sessionDescription": "Creating migration session", "sessionMemory": "Starting database migration work", "toolContext": "Creating session", "primaryGoal": "Manage database migration", "subgoal": "Create work session"}, "name": "Database Migration Sprint", "description": "Planning and executing database schema migration to v3.0"}
Copy the main configuration to create a development config

tool_call: vaultManager_duplicateNote
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732002400000_g1h2i3j4k", "workspaceId": "ws_1732002400000_l5m6n7o8p", "sessionDescription": "Creating dev config", "sessionMemory": "Duplicating config for development", "toolContext": "Duplicating file", "primaryGoal": "Setup dev environment", "subgoal": "Duplicate config"}, "sourcePath": "/config/production.json", "targetPath": "/config/development.json"}
Result: {"success": true, "created": true, "path": "/backup/schema.sql"}

tool_call: vaultManager_moveNote
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732002600000_a1b2c3d4e", "workspaceId": "ws_1732002600000_f5g6h7i8j", "sessionDescription": "Organizing backups", "sessionMemory": "Backup created, now organizing", "toolContext": "Moving file", "primaryGoal": "Organize backups", "subgoal": "Move to dated folder"}, "path": "/backup/schema.sql", "newPath": "/backup/2025-11-21/schema.sql"}
Run a security audit using the security scanner agent
Delete the temporary notes folder
Result: {"success": true, "deletedPath": "/old-docs"}
Disable the test-agent that keeps running
Copy the config.json file to config.backup.json

tool_call: vaultManager_duplicateNote
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732101000000_k1l2m3n4o", "workspaceId": "ws_1732101000000_p5q6r7s8t", "sessionDescription": "Backing up config", "sessionMemory": "Creating backup before changes", "toolContext": "Duplicating config file", "primaryGoal": "Backup configuration", "subgoal": "Create config backup"}, "sourcePath": "/config.json", "targetPath": "/config.backup.json"}
Result: {"success": true, "sessionId": "session_1732000000000_m4i5g6r7a"}

tool_call: memoryManager_updateSession
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732101200000_m3n4o5p6q", "workspaceId": "ws_1732101200000_r7s8t9u0v", "sessionDescription": "Updating session details", "sessionMemory": "Session created, adding description", "toolContext": "Updating session metadata", "primaryGoal": "Document session purpose", "subgoal": "Add session description"}, "sessionId": "session_1732000000000_m4i5g6r7a", "description": "Migration tracking session"}
Result: {"error": "Path '/exports/data.json' not found"}
